Class IterativeClosestPointMatcher_OLD

  • java.lang.Object

  • Deprecated.

    public class IterativeClosestPointMatcher_OLD
extends Object
    This class implements the Iterative Closest Point algorithm for n-dimensional samples. TODO: change to use a variable fitter (currently ProcrustesFit only).
